title: ŠAMPON ZA LASE IN TELO KOKOSOVO MLEKO, AFRODITA, 1L

contact-information.kontakt:: Kozmetika Afrodita d.o.o., Kidričeva 54, 3250 Rogaška Slatina, Slovenija

product-info.opis: Telo, lase in lasišče bogato neguje in osveži ter jim prinaša razkošno mehkobo. Hranljiva in osvežujoča nega.

ingredient-information.sestavine: Aqua,Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Cocamidopropyl Betaine,Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Cocos Nucifera Fruit Juice, Cocamide DEA,PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Parfum, Citric Acid, Methylisothiazolinone, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Benzyl Salicylate.
